body.p: Created by the Revenue Act of 1862 on July 1, 1862 to fund the Civil War. Commissioner(s): George S. Boswell (1862-1863); Joseph J. Lewis (1863-1865); William Orton (1865); Edward A. Rollins (1865-1869).
